LanguageData.PruningSpeed.description: A multiplier on how fast this person can prune a Gauranlen tree to maintain their connection with it.\n\nPruning is more of a contemplative psychic task than a physical one, so health factors like vision are unimportant here.
LanguageData.PruningSpeed.label: გასხვლის სიჩქარე
LanguageData.SuppressionPower.label: ჩახშობის ძალა
